code: var _this=this;import axios from'axios';export var auth=function auth(checkAccess){return axios.post('/check-token',{id:checkAccess.id}).then(function(res){console.log(res.data);_this.props.history.push('/programs');return res.data;}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);_this.props.history.push('/');});};export var jwtToken=function jwtToken(){return localStorage.getItem('jwt-token');};
